name: You In Debt
description:
My entry for the MUG Game Jam 2021.

You are a employ, burdened with debt. The government can get rid of it if you agree to help them to fight of the alien invasion.

Sorry but I tried a million things to get the  music and sounds working, but in vain. Hope you understand ＞︿＜. Its difficult but do-able

Have Fun!
